title: (x) Hank Mobley "A Caddy for Daddy" album cover - CG Devinne, Compacta {Simon H, Jan E}
content:
Can anyone identify the title and the artist font? Sorry for the bad pic…

Thank you.  
(Now with image!)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203163042im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/hank-mobley-a-caddy-for-daddy_5024.jpg)

 [‹ (x) AARP slab serif - Boomer Serif (custom typeface) {Mr. Schwartz}](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203163042/http:/www.typophile.com/node/17002 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Logo on Sprite can - custom drawn {Chris Keegan} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203163042/http:/www.typophile.com/node/38413 "Go to next forum topic")
author: miss c

comments.content:
I think “Hank Mobley” might be CG Devinne

[http://www.fonts.com/FindFonts/detail.htm?pid=203134](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203163042/http:/www.fonts.com/FindFonts/detail.htm?pid=203134 "http://www.fonts.com/FindFonts/detail.htm?pid=203134")

“Caddy for Daddy” could be Compacta Light or Light Compressed.

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/letraset/compacta/familytree.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203163042/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/letraset/compacta/familytree.html "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/letraset/compacta/familytree.html")
